name: Dugeon Platformer
description:
This is a 2D platformer game that I made.

I made this game just to be my portfolio.

I will develop this game with the Adventure theme.

Where players will have an adventure defeating monsters, mini bosses, bosses and collecting items and coins from their adventures to increase player status to make them stronger.

For now this game is still in the stage of developing game features.

This game will be updated once a week.

Update Next Week :

  • Add more obstacle
  • Add objective
  • Enemy AI
  • Update Map

If you are interested in my game, please download it.

=================================================

This Version : v1.0

Date : 4/12/2022
